title: Lead Role in Feature Film
description: We are seeking a talented actor for the lead role in our upcoming feature film. Must have strong acting skills and experience in dramatic roles. Auditions will be held next month.

title: Supporting Role in TV Series
description: Looking for an actor to play a supporting role in our new TV series. Must be able to work well in an ensemble cast and have experience in episodic television. Auditions start next week.
requirements: Ability to work well in an ensemble cast

title: Voiceover Artist for Animated Film
description: We are casting for a voiceover artist to provide the voice for a character in our upcoming animated film. Must have experience in voice acting and be able to bring the character to life.
requirements: Ability to bring characters to life

title: Lead Singer for Rock Band
description: Rock band seeking lead singer for upcoming tour. Must have powerful vocals and stage presence. Auditions will be held next week.

title: Dancer for Music Video
description: Looking for a dancer to perform in a music video for a popular artist. Must have strong dance skills and be comfortable performing in front of a camera.
requirements: Comfortable performing in front of a camera

title: Model for Fashion Show
description: Fashion show casting for models to showcase new designer collections. Must have runway experience and be able to work well with stylists and designers.
requirements: Ability to work with stylists and designers

title: Stunt Performer for Action Movie
description: Action movie casting for stunt performers for high-octane action scenes. Must have experience in stunt work and be comfortable with physical demands.

title: Comedian for Comedy Club
description: Comedy club seeking comedian for upcoming performances. Must have strong comedic timing and original material. Auditions will be held next month.

title: TV Presenter for News Program
description: News program casting for TV presenter to anchor daily news broadcasts. Must have experience in broadcast journalism and be comfortable reporting live.

title: Background Actor for Film
description: Film casting for background actors for various scenes. No experience necessary, but must be comfortable taking direction from the director.
